name: Spac3310
description:
A little game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam (https://itch.io/jam/3310jam)

84x48 pixel, 2 colors!

Drive you spaceship though 10 levels! 

Collect all the carbon pieces to complete the level!

Use RIGHT and LEFT arrow keys to move the ship

(there's a little CHEAT to skip level, find it out!)
